name: The Soulstream Expansive
description:
An ADVENTURE of EXPANSIVE PROPORTIONS...

In a world with a scientist finding a way for females to advance in the world and genetically become superior to males... 

An accident occurs in the lab, and her research is unleashed...

It is up to little Luca to fend off the devastation that this certain virus causes, and maybe he is the last hope for men, lest us be smothered under them... 

Choices will be made...

Will you bow and let the women take over, and grow to massive proportions?

Will you befriend some?

Will you fight for your normal sized world again?

This coming in the world, of the Soulstream Expansive...

FEATURES

-Fight off the Evolving Virus and Baddies

-Choose to Submit, Struggle, Or Fight

-Interact with females all growing in different ways, by different means

-Befriend or Get on the wrong side of the females you will meet

-Explore a new world where men are the weaker and smaller, and shrinking in power by the minute.

-Choices with consequences...

Anyway, Im here to tell you I plan to make a full game of this, and it's gonna take some time and dedication.

This build is a little short, but is really just to showcase some of the potential that this game can have!

If anyone is interested in the project, (making sprites to help contribute, Audio for in game, animating, pixel art.) Feel free to hit me up on here and Ill get you my discord!!!

Here's some tips and features!

-A and D move you left and right

-Hold Shift to run!

-W or Space is to jump

-V is to Punch

-` is to restart the level

- z and x is to zoom in and out (only use this after you are smothered or it gets wonky)

-To escape get that keycard first!

-Use Punch to Knock on a door, Punch through it, and interact with the console!

-Your sister will talk to you different as she grows if you stand around waiting for her ass! Or if you try to get out!

Roadmap!

-Full Struggle mechanic when you are pinned!

-Better Dialog!

-Towns to go to!

-Npcs and other girls to interact with!

-Baddies to beat!

-Different girls to confront with different "growth problems"!

-Full storyline to why the girls are growing and all!

- Choices to make and consequences!

I gotta admit it'll be a little bit before the next build comes out, but if you feel like checking the status just message me for my discord!

And if you feel like donating to development, Its greatly appreciated!

Check my Ko-Fi here - ko-fi.com/sou1streamexpans1ve
